items.sentence: Tom wasn't bothered in the slightest when he didn't get the job he'd applied for.
Tom was normally very reliable and his absence from the meeting was inexplicable.
If it were OK for me to only work on weekends, would I do it? Of course, I would.
Tom prefers to have a shower in the morning while Mary prefers a bath before bed.
One of my friends in high school was named Tom. He had blonde hair and blue eyes.
